Description.Text:
Featuring free WiFi, a restaurant and a year-round outdoor pool, Nord Luxxor Tambaú offers accommodations in João Pessoa, just 17.7 km from Jacumã. The hotel has a playground and fitness center, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free private parking is available on site.
The rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer.
You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.
Baía da Traição is 46.7 km from Nord Luxxor Tambaú , and Cabedelo is 16.1 km away. The nearest airport is Presidente Castro Pinto International Airport, 14.5 km from Nord Luxxor Tambaú.
Tambau is a great choice for travelers interested in sand beaches, sunsets and local food.
